message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's a unique opportunity to get a high-quality item at an exceptional value. I'm confident it will meet your needs and exceed your expectations. I propose a price of $140 for this product. I believe this is a fair offer considering its worth to both of us.
I'm really interested in the product, but $140 is a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $125 for it. I think it's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
